SpellDef.Description: The caster gets +10 to defense when defending, as well as +1 tactical health regeneration for the rest of the battle (additional +1 to both of these bonuses per life shard).
Drop your shield down like a hammer, doing damage and knocking a target prone unless they resist. Requires a shield.
Your weapon conflagrates a target for your attack value plus 30 fire damage (additional +2 per fire shard), half if the victim resists.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Your weapon conflagrates a target for your attack value plus %d fire damage, half if the victim resists.

SpellDef.Description: A wave of unspeakable horror overpowers the mind of all adjacent enemies, dealing 12 damage (+2 per death shard), per member. Resisting units take no damage.
The Paladin's blows land with supernatural force, granting the Overpower ability, and +10% damage bonus with each successful attack.
An enemy and all units within 1 radius take 10 (+2 per fire shard) in fire damage. This damage is multiplied by each member of the enemy unit - beware, the fists will burn the caster as well!

A minor earthquake damages all units in a 5 tile line the target for 20 (+2 per earth shard) damage (then multiplied by the number of troops), and knocks them prone for 1 round, unless they resist. This spell will hit allies in range!

Your weapon's blow creates a lightning bolt that stuns for 1 turn and does 8 (+2 per air shard) lighting damage to all units within 1 radius, multiplied by the number of members in the unit (can be resisted). This will hit the caster and allies!
Your weapon strike sucks all heat from the air, dealing 10 cold damage (+2 per water shard), per member, to all units within 2 tiles. Beware, this will damage the caster and any allies in range!
Calls down a focused wrath of light from above, dealing 40 Arcane Light damage (+4 per Life shard), half if the unit resists.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Lightning strikes a random enemy group for %d Arcane Light damage.

SpellDef.Description: Calls a spirit animal to you as a mount. You may be bound to as simple a creature as a stable horse - or one far more rare and powerful.
Calls a spirit animal to you as a mount. You may be bound to as simple a creature as a stable horse - or one far more rare and powerful.
The caster is encased in light that heals 100 points and makes them immune to physical damage, Frost, Fire, and Shock for 3 turns. Another turn is immediately taken.
Your weapon does a third of your attack rating in physical damage and 10 cold damage to 3 adjacent enemies (additional +2 cold damage per water shard).
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Your weapon does a third of your attack rating in physicaldamage and %d cold damage to 3 adjacent enemies.

SpellDef.Description: A gust of wind bolsters your weapon strike, doing attack damage to up to 3 targets, also knocking them back and prone (prone is avoided if they resist).

SpellDef.Description: Target unit loses 50% of Hit Points and Defense, or takes normal attack damage if resisted.

SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Launch a %d Attack, dazes the target (unless they resist) and knocks them back..

SpellDef.Description: Elemental Life confers might in the champion, giving them a bonus, for every life shard, of +2 attack, +1 Arcane Light Attack, +10 Arcane Shadow Resist, and +2 hit points.
An attack that does +50% damage for each member of the enemy group, but requires a broadsword, longsword, or greatsword.

Target is struck with a powerful blow that does 75% of your combined attack damage, and ignores all defense - affects even targets immune to physical damage. Requires a broadsword, longsword, or greatsword.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Target is struck with a %d Attack that ignores defense and can damage the non-corporeal.

SpellDef.Description: Heals an adjacent unit by 15 (+4 per life shard) once per battle.
Rush through enemies in a straight line, dealing damage equal to your attack to any in your way. Requires a sword equipped.
Searches for injustices in the world that the Paladin may right. There may be great rewards for success.
Search for justice as sovereign. But how dedicated to ideals can a ruler remain while retaining authority?

If your attack hits, target unit dies unless they resist, in which case they still take your weapon damage.
Teleport to any location in tactical combat, stunning any enemies within 1 tile.
Teleport to any location in Tactical combat, and your dodge is increased by 60 (+5 per death shard) for 3 turns.
Sacrifice a unit to convert their life force into +8 attack (+2 per death shard) for duration of the battle.
The caster gets +20% damage reflection (+10% per death shard) for the rest of the battle.
Damaging an enemy also stuns them, unless resisted.

If a friendly unit is killed in battle they are resurrected with half their hit points. This enchantment lasts for 5 actions or until a unit is resurrected. BEWARE - this spell will permanently reduce the caster's hit points by 1.
Disrupts a spell an adjacent enemy unit is casting unless they resist.
Transfers 8 hit points (+4 per death shard) from 3 adjacent enemy units to the caster.
SpellDef.FormattedDescription: Transfers %d hit points from enemy unit to the caster. That damage is halved if the enemy resists.

SpellDef.Description: Transfers 3 hit points per level from all enemies to the caster. BEWARE - casting this spell permanently costs 1 hitpoint.
